duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and direct professional civil engineering activities associated with the planning, design, maintenance, and construction of private development and public works projects.
Oversee the management of engineering activities associated with city engineering and public works operations and maintenance.
Attend and participate in City Council meetings, construction meetings and other Board and Committee meetings as needed.
Develop the City Engineering Budget including Capital Improvement Plan.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree with major course work in civil engineering from a recognized college or university.
Possession of a Professional Civil Engineer’s license in the State of California and California Drivers License.
